name: BIATHLON SHOOTING GAME
description:
WELCOME TO BIATHLON SHOOTING GAME!!

Run, shoot and beat your firends in the new official Biathlon Azzurro shooting game!!! In the competition, you will play as a Biathlon athlet and  your goal is to reach the finish line like in the real sport. Be the best, get more points as you can and live the Biathlon world!

COMANDS

ON COMPUTER

--RACE MODE--

arrow up/ W = to go up

arrow down/ S = to go down

P = to pause the game

--SHOOTING MODE--

Left click =to  shoot

ON MOBILE

--RACE MODE--

tap the arrow up = to go up

tap the arrow down =to  go down

tap the pause button = to pause the game

--SHOOTING MODE--

tap the screen= to shoot
